title: October Commissions Are OPEN! and now CLOSED.
description: I am opening up four commission slots for the month of October. I’ve been drawing some really fun stuff including D&D characters, MMO characters, X-men, the family dog but like in space and I even had a commission last month to redraw our old Strawberry Shortcake comic.
excerpt: Videogaming-related online strip by Mike Krahulik and Jerry Holkins. Includes news and commentary.
text: October 1, 2024 I am opening up four commission slots for the month of October. I’ve been drawing some really fun stuff including D&D characters, MMO characters, X-men, the family dog but like in space and I even had a commission last month to redraw our old Strawberry Shortcake comic. If you’d like to get a drawing done by me please take a look at my Atristree site. This page has all the details you need and allows you to submit a request. Give me all the details you can and be sure and let me know if you want a background or not.  Thanks so much to everyone who has been supporting me through these commissions, it really means a lot to me.  -Gabe Out
html:
October 1, 2024

I am opening up four commission slots for the month of October. I’ve been drawing some really fun stuff including D&D characters, MMO characters, X-men, the family dog but like in space and I even had a commission last month to redraw our old Strawberry Shortcake comic.


If you’d like to get a drawing done by me please take a look at my Atristree site. This page has all the details you need and allows you to submit a request. Give me all the details you can and be sure and let me know if you want a background or not.  Thanks so much to everyone who has been supporting me through these commissions, it really means a lot to me. 


-Gabe Out
